mapper.select: SELECT A.PRO_NO, A.FILE_NAME, A.DEPTH, A.FILE_ID, A.PARENT_ID FROM FILE_TREE A, FILE_TREE B WHERE A.PRO_NO = #{proNo} AND A.PRO_NO = B.PRO_NO AND A.FILE_NAME = B.FILE_NAME AND A.DEPTH = B.DEPTH AND A.FILE_ID = B.FILE_ID AND A.PARENT_ID = B.PARENT_ID GROUP BY A.PRO_NO, A.FILE_NAME, A.DEPTH, A.FILE_ID, A.PARENT_ID
SELECT FILE_PATH FROM BFILE WHERE SUBSTR(FILE_PATH,0,3) IN (SELECT PRO_NO FROM PROJECT_JOIN_STATE WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} ) AND FILE_PATH LIKE #{proNo}||'%' AND FILE_ISDELETED = 'F'

SELECT A.PRO_NO, A.FILE_NAME, A.DEPTH, A.FILE_ID, A.PARENT_ID FROM FILE_TREE A, FILE_TREE B, PROJECT_JOIN_STATE C WHERE A.PRO_NO = C.PRO_NO AND C.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND A.PRO_NO = B.PRO_NO AND A.FILE_NAME = B.FILE_NAME AND A.DEPTH = B.DEPTH AND A.FILE_ID = B.FILE_ID AND A.PARENT_ID = B.PARENT_ID GROUP BY A.PRO_NO, A.FILE_NAME, A.DEPTH, A.FILE_ID, A.PARENT_ID
